column4: I was hoping one of you might help. I tried installing feisty, upon reboot the black loading screen's bar doesn't even move. Any advice?

I was hoping one of you might help. I tried installing feisty, upon reboot the black loading screen's bar doesn't even move. 1gb swap, 10g "/" and over 150gb for media, is it possible I have set it up incorrectly? Any advice?

remove "quiet" and "splash" from the boot kernel options in order to see where it hangs
